# Pull Request Checklist

## Description
<!-- Describe the problem and how your changes solve it. -->
 
## Testing Steps and Results
<!-- Provide clear, concise instructions on how to test the changes. -->
 
## Functionality
- [ ] Does the code meet the user requirement according to the user story?
- [ ] Are all functions correctly implemented?

## Code Quality
- [ ] Is the code clean, readable, and well-structured?
- [ ] Are functions/methods short and focused on a single task?
- [ ] Are method, function, and variable names easy to understand and consistent?

## Testing
- [ ] Are unit tests included and passing?
- [ ] Are integration tests included for API endpoints?
- [ ] Are API responses working as expected?
- [ ] Are Postman collections updated and tested for new/modified endpoints?

## Branching & Workflow
- [ ] Is this feature implemented in a separate branch with a clear name?
- [ ] Is this pull request linked to a backlog item or user story?

## CI/CD
- [ ] Does the code pass all CI checks?
- [ ] Are deployment scripts or workflows updated if needed?
